cast.overview: Two mismatched entrepreneurs – egghead innovator Mike Lazaridis and cut-throat businessman Jim Balsillie – joined forces in an endeavour that was to become a worldwide hit in little more than a decade. The story of the meteoric rise and catastrophic demise of the world's first smartphone.
cast.title: BlackBerry

cast.overview: When K-pop superstars Rumi, Mira and Zoey aren't selling out stadiums, they're using their secret powers to protect their fans from supernatural threats.
cast.title: KPop Demon Hunters
cast.character: Abs Saja / Bathhouse Patron / Social Media Fan (voice)

details.biography: SungWon Cho, also known as ProZD, is a Korean American actor, voice actor, sketch comedian and YouTuber. He is best known for his role as Detective Joe Furuya in Anime Crimes Division and for his many voice acting roles, most notably FL4K from Borderlands 3 and Johnny from the OK K.O.! Let's Be Heroes. He is represented by Creative Artists Agency.
details.name: SungWon Cho
